website_summaries.verdict: This incredible toiletry bag allows you to easily pack and organize all of your necessities while traveling.
pros: Carry it with you with a handy shoulder strap, and upon arrival, the bag opens up to conveniently hang from a coat hook, doorknob, or towel rack
With 23 pockets and compartments, there is no shortage of space for all of your travel needs
Spacious enough to hold full-size bottles of shampoo
cons: It is a bulky cosmetic bag, and will take up quite a bit of room in your suitcase

customer_reviews.title: Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love this bag! My main reason for purchasing it was to use while motorcycle riding when space is limited with what I can bring so I am always looking for different ways to fit what I need in my saddlebags, etc., which are on the small size. This fits perfectly inside my bag. I can put all of our toiletries in the side pouches and the top "flap" and pack my undergarments and probably 7 shirts inside the main compartment. I am thrilled! I respect this company - I have a UV nail light for when I do my own gel nails and it has worked wonderfully for over 4 years now. Quality products for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tlbyker

customer_reviews.title: Great with a mod...
customer_reviews.text: With weight it tends to lean outward. So using 550 cord and s-hooks I have weight equaled between the outter d rings to the central hook. Also using epoxy I beefed up the top part where the upper support attaches to the bag itself. I say this because I LIVE out of my bag. I work group homes and do overnights all week. This bag is outstandingly ideal. Like really awesome. Buy it for a normal person, and if you use it DAILY and FULL do a couple simple mods. Very happy :^)
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Very strudy for road trips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to travel with my products as i dont like the hotel soaps. This bag not only fit full size bottles of shampoo, conditioner, and body soap but also had lots of room for hair brushes, toothpaste/brushes, hair products, and makeup. It also hands if you need it too. I had it hanging up on my most recent trip with it full and it held up with the weight. Very good product, good size, and great price point. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: A good product for the price. Have been looking for something that will hold all our toiletry junk when we travel. We have shampoo, conditioner, contact solution and cases, moisturizer, hair products (3), toothpaste and brushes, razor and travel size cream, medications, and a few other small items. After our first outing with this case, we've concluded that we'll still probably have to put our shampoo and conditioner in a separate case. Everything fit, but it didn't zip without a struggle. We didn't want to break the zipper. The bottom piece seems a bit flimsy. But overall, a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly made bag. It arrived dirty, and already torn. Very disappointed in the quality. I had to return it. I would not recommend ordering this bag.
customer_reviews.author: William Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Really great travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great size to hold travel items, including full size shampoo bottles, comb, toothbrush, etc. Love the zippered compartments. The shoulder strap can be hooked over your rollaboard handle for easy transport. Highly recommend this. Well made and is better than anything I could find in stores, including The Container Store! (and I love the Container Store)
customer_reviews.author: nbarton

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, Organized.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 2 years now. It has lasted many trips and holds all the toiletries for a family of 4. You can keep things organized and when you hang the bag it doesn't fall over. It also fits regular sized bottles so we don't have to always buy travel size for everyone. Does take up a lot of space if you want to put it in a luggage.
customer_reviews.author: JackieG

customer_reviews.title: Best toiletry travel bag I have seen.
customer_reviews.text: I scored on this toiletry bag. Roomier than most and well engineered for maximum functionality. Will definitely provide the organization I seek as well as ample space for larger than travel size items Arrived as promised and well packaged. A solid purchase in every way. Picky travelers will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money since it really is no good if ...
customer_reviews.text: This broke during my third vacation. I only had less than 3 months. Don't waste your money since it really is no good if you can't hang.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item about 3 months ago. It came quickly and it held all our bathroom products really nicely!! I really liked the different compartments and pockets. I had my side he has his and our big stuff in the middle! We travel full time so we are always on the go. This travel bag has completely fallen apart on me. All the threads have come out. And the zippers don’t zip anymore. We don’t over pack it. I’m very surprised by how low quality it ended up being. Now I have to search for another!
customer_reviews.author: Tristen mckelvey

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than you think!
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! I wanted a bag that would help my teenage daughter make it through a week of camp with all of her "necessary" toiletries all in one location. This fit the bill! It holds so much more than I imagined! Everything fit and it held up so well with a not so careful teenager! I loved it so much I bought more for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: S. Early

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bag. I'm so happy with it. It's great for travel and for home. It holds a lot of your favorite items and products you use all the time. And I love the handle! I read a lot of reviews and the MelodySusie bag had fantastic reviews so I bought this one. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: joeyjhg2

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I am using it to store extra cosmetics that I have; I love the storage space and it sure is a pretty bag, so clean and nice. Other reviews I have read stated that the bag is flimsy, but I am not using it for that purpose, only for storage, so I will unlikely be able to judge whether it holds up under those conditions. For me and the use I will put it to, the bag is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita

customer_reviews.title: Fits better in suitcase than expected
customer_reviews.text: Might seem less significant, but the size of this item really fit well in my suitcase. I found other cases able to handle a similar volume of toiletries were a challenge to fit with clothes and shoes. It is well made, and very much as described. I am just about to take my first trip using it. I will update with my experience afterward. Edited to add: Used for first time this past weekend. Still like it quite a lot. Strikes a good balance between holding everything well, protecting all the toiletries from becoming "smushed" in the suitcase, and being flexible with space requirement in the suitcase. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P.

customer_reviews.title: large but it fits everything
customer_reviews.text: it's on the large side but it fits everything. Even full size bottles that I can't transfer into small bottles. I don't have to back 2 and 3 different toiletry bags because of the multiple compartments and plenty of space. Things I was on the fence about packing due to space, is no longer a concern. I will have everything I need when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got this for me as a gift. I love it! I tend to pack a bunch of crap when we go anywhere so this has really helped me downsize but also keep all my stuff that I do bring, organized.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Austin

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  One bag to hold it all!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bag to hold makeup and toiletries, that will allow the items to be accessed easily. I haven't used it on a trip yet (just got it), but really liked the spaciousness of the bag. Because of its depth, I opted to use some containers to hold travel-size products, and feel I was able to utilize all the space. I think I'm going to Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Mern

customer_reviews.title: I think because of the great reviews, I have expected too much
customer_reviews.text: I think because of the great reviews, I have expected too much, and I am a little disappointed, although I am not going to return it. The idea is good, but the execution needs improvement. I am not fussy so I can definitely use it when I travel in a few months. I will update after I can actually test the quality. I probably just expected too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An okay buy
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this product until I went to hang it on a door with some stuff in it. It wanted to lean forward and almost dump stuff out
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. Smaller than i had hoped but it works and my really good one that got stolen is discontinued so this is the next best thing
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year and a half ago and it's still going strong! I travel a LOT and have brought it EVERYWHERE. It fits a LOT of stuff and separates everything very well. Definitely buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Tall toiletry bag fits large full size products
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toiletry bag that accommodated tall bottles and this one was the tallest I found. This fits my full-size Aveda shampoo and conditioner bottles, mousse, etc. The material and stitching seem sturdy. I like that the bottom has a removable interior piece so that it can be stored flat when not in use. It arrived yesterday and I'll be using it within the next few days. The only thing I can say that I don't care for is the somewhat large logo on the front, but I'm sure I won't care once I confirm I no longer have to fight to squeeze things in.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!! IT PROTECTED ALL OF MY MAKING DURING TRAVEL! IT HELD EVERYTHING. MY HYGIENE AND BEAUTY PRODUCTS, COMES , BRUSHES, PINS, MAKEUP BRUSHES, MAKE UP REMOVER, ROLLERS AND MORE!! GREAT COMPACT AND SPACIOUS BAG THATS VERY STRUDY.
customer_reviews.author: Mahogany Wren

customer_reviews.title: Extremely roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. Very impressed by how much it holds! It's almost like a Tardis: bigger on the inside! Clever design too. And looks good. He's 21 and he loves it. Here's hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Turbogramma

customer_reviews.title: Great for Long Term Travel
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for long term travel. It’s quite large and can fit full size products but doesn’t fit into an overnight bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Newman

customer_reviews.title: I loved the size of the bag
customer_reviews.text: Previously (below) I gave 3 stars b/c the strap of my bag was broken when it was never used. After I posted, the staff reached out to offer me a completely new bag. I am blown away by the amazing customer service. I'm so excited to utilize the bag to its fullest during my upcoming trips. :). Previous 3 star rating: I loved the size of the bag. However, when I went to put on the strap for the first time, I broke! I was so frustrated. I wanted to carry the bag with my hygiene items for a weekend trip, but it made it harder to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this so bad as I needed to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this so bad as I needed to use it for an upcoming vacation. Opened it up and the left hand side zip pocket was sewn in upside down. Obviously there is no quality control before shipping out to customers. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: asha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 👍
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product great price. My wife loves it and uses it for travel. Takes a lot of makeup and other traveling ascensions. Easy to use and fantastic space setup. Get it 👍
customer_reviews.author: KNIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This guy is great. I travel for work and have used this almost every day for the past 10 months. It has plenty of compartments/pockets, can be hanged and on a door hook or set on the counter. I've washed it in the washing machine a few times on the delicate cycle, and it's held up great.
customer_reviews.author: toonces

customer_reviews.title: Tons of storage in this compact tote!
customer_reviews.text: Went from place to place this summer and needed something sturdy and easy to pack up. This was the perfect solution!! Will purchase more to gift for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! It fits so much. Is excellent quality and so many slots for storage. We are heading to Europe for a week so I have a lot of stuff and this thing is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Best toiletries bag I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a toiletries bag for a week-long trip and this fit the bill perfectly! I was able to easily carry makeup, toothbrushes, hygiene items, hair products, and much more. I'm a huge fan of the shoulder strap. I expect this bag to serve me well for years!
customer_reviews.author: Aureol

customer_reviews.title: Used it once
customer_reviews.text: Used this only 1 time and the outside zipper no longer closes. Because of its size and the amount of items you can put inside I am afraid that the other zippers will give out too.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Stained.
customer_reviews.text: Revived this item today, complete with with what looks to be a giant ink stain. I don’t know if that means it is pre used or what...
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Batte

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift and receiver loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter's fiancé who is becoming a Barber. She said he immediately put all of his tools in the bag. Haven't spoke to them since, so I don't really know how it's working out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Big, spacious, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool bag. I am traveling with an infant and this fit all my things, husbands and baby. It’s spacious with plenty of room for all your toiletries. I recommend if you want plenty of condensed space for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my trips and let’s just say it make any organizing way easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! Haven't used it quite yet for travel
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Haven't used it quite yet for travel, but I am super excited to find something that will hold all the toiletries for my whole family(me, my husband and our 4 small kids), I was looking for something so that I didn't have to pack multiple toiletry bags and this will do the trick. One central bag for all the toiletries!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Fill

customer_reviews.title: we loved it! It's so convenient to hang in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used this on a trip, we loved it! It's so convenient to hang in the bathroom & have everything you needed right there. I was worried the hook wouldn't be able to hold the weight of everything in the bag. We traveled for over a week & hung it up in each hotel as soon as we got there & it stayed there until we left. It came through it great, looks just like new!
customer_reviews.author: Smileleeface

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cruises
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you’re going on a cruise, or any traveling can just keep everything right in the pouch and hang it up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I should have realized the side compartments would not stay open. I have to my daughter in law and she likes it. It was large enough to hold all my cosmetics and shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toiletries
customer_reviews.text: I carry a lot of toiletries and things I carry when I travel and this is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and that means a lot of hair products to keep it under control. I'm going to Jamaica for 2 1/2 weeks and needed something that would fit all my stuff. This is it! Made of sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: Bcampbell

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: If you do tons of travel, you’ve gotta have this! I travel for work and this made my life so much easier. But, be prepared to sacrifice the room in your suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen E

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's the perfect size for what I was needing. I could put this in a bigger bag, but more often I would just carry it by itself. I can fit all my toiletries and the things for my 4 yo and 1 yo in it.
customer_reviews.author: cmariemom

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but...
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious,plenty of pockets, nice looking but the zippers stick and don't work smoothly and the pockets inside are made of very thin material. After using the bag for a few days the zippers freed up and work normally.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toiletry bag. I purchased it for a vacation in Ireland. It is wonderful for travel sized products or full sized. There are so many pockets for makeup brushes, razors, brushes, etc. It also has a hook to hang if counter space is limited. Such a worthwhile purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SDuane

customer_reviews.title: Good storage but arrived damaged & poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is large with good storage. However, the product arrived damaged with markings on the inside flap (as if someone ran over it). It is also made poorly. The lining in the side zipper pocket ripped on the seam after just 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I just wish it came in a better pattern. I would but for a gift for someone if they had cuter fabric but I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Attal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact bag!
customer_reviews.text: This little bag is just perfect. I am a visiting nurse. I find all the different compartments quite helpful. I use this bag for quick visits as it has different sections. I can separate the clean and not clean. The size and the weight is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joybrown

customer_reviews.title: yee
customer_reviews.text: fit a lot of stuff and never leaked. hung up easily in hotel bathtroom. helped keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: Doot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this YEARS ago! I've loved it ever since!! It's PERFECT for all your bathroom essentials. I initially bought it for vacation and I STILL use it NOW it helps to keep more space on my SMALL bathroom countertop! Great buy, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed as I am leaving out of town in just ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally just opened it out of the box and the zipper is missing it’s other half. Annoyed as I am leaving out of town in just a few days. 🙄 Now I am on day ONE of using my bag and having even attempted to try and hang it but for some reason my hook is almost completely detached. Not impressed at all. Would not recommend this brand. The idea is awesome but the brand’s quality is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Day

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Convenient bag for grab and go, it's slightly too large for one person doing single bag air travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lau

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space
customer_reviews.text: Carries everything thing and still has room for more. But it is a little big for smaller counters when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great size and holds all my toiletries easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size and holds all my toiletries easily. The top two pockets were damaged upon arrival and I didn’t have enough time to send for a replacement before my trip.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiC

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers stated, the front mesh part is too slack. Cannot hang up or products will hang forward/even fall out. Won't sit upright on a countertop. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sharon cleveland

customer_reviews.title: good size, not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: The top zipper ripped on the very first use....still usable, but now its not secure... good size, not a good quality. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hobo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, roomy but compact, lots of individual compartments I'm super happy with this little bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder’s Leash

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this purchase. The size is great. I love that I can use a shoulder carry strap. The fabric is a little thinner than I expected. I’m sure it will last a good while but I expected a thicker fabric more like a carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandre Jno-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that the only things is couldn't fit in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I put all my things in this bag to make sure everything fit. I was able to fit all my shower stuff, hair products and other bathroom products. I put all full sized products in the bag. I didn't transfer any of my products into travel size bottles. Everything I put in the bag I use on a daily basis. I was disappointed that the only things is couldn't fit in this toiletrie bag was my makeup bag, blow dryer and my hair wand. So I wish this bag was a bit bigger. Over all I really like this bag and it will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Nordblad

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for all bottles, make up and travel straightener and travel dryer. Difficult return process so stuck with this. Might work for one person. Not big enough for a family...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This was such a great product. It held all off my families toiletries ...
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great product. It held all off my families toiletries during our vacation. It compact size made it possible to fit in the suitcase without taking up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: MONTOYA R. RAINEY

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and well organized
customer_reviews.text: After extensively researching similar products I chose this one because it holds full-size bottles. It is exactly what I was looking for. It's roomy, sturdy and well organized. It could use a small clip to hold the hanging hook out of the way while zipping but other than that it is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made, large, sturdy bag. Would definitely recommend. This was bought as a gift for someone, and I am thinking of getting one for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: Tammey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag, sturdy enough for a couple full sized ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, sturdy enough for a couple full sized items, plenty of small items and whatever else you need. I stuffed this thing full and the zipper was sturdy and the hook held tough. Great bag, so great that my oldest son claimed it as soon as I got back from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Packed our toiletries for a 14 day ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Packed our toiletries for a 14 day cruise and had plenty of room for everything! Love the side Pockets for tooth brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a little larger than I anticipated. However, I really like it and all the different compartments for organizing. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CaliAngel

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I set this up in my bathroom and when I go on my trip in dec it will be easy to just take it down, zip it up and go. All my beauty products already packed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mrabet

customer_reviews.title: Great for long trips
customer_reviews.text: I just used this on a trip across the country. It held up great, kept everything organized and was able to hold what two organizers did in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep all your products together
customer_reviews.text: Son uses it for all his clippers brushes and hair products. He loves it. Great for travel and home use
customer_reviews.author: S. T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for toiletry and this one just works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Tukky

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BAG!!!!! Worked great for 15 days in Israel. It will hold full size bottles with room to spare. Fit great in my 29" luggage. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Travel necessities
customer_reviews.text: I take this with me on all medication it comes in so handy
customer_reviews.author: Ratesha Haynesworth

customer_reviews.title: Def would not recommend packing this for vacation
customer_reviews.text: This was way larger than I expected. I bought this to pack my skin and hair care items for travel -- but this took up a large chunk of space in my luggage. Def would not recommend packing this for vacation. Great durability and carry handle. I just wished this was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Yim

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Rather flimsy and when arrived one of the zipper pulls was missing. Needed it right away and opted not to return
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cantilli

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with how many 'compartments' are in this product. Yet, when full and zipped, it is very light.
customer_reviews.author: SamsPookie

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific bag. I use it for make-up & toiletries. I don't even carry a purse anymore but just use this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had for over a year and travel everyday. My toiletries are permanently in this bag. I use it everyday. Looks like the day I bought it. Nothing broke yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked a lot. Very nice size. Perfect to travel
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tomazini Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, holds enough toiletries for a 3 week trip. Even room for his stuff👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Frey

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel bag. It's very roomy and has plenty of pockets. I am so happy to replace my old one with this. I would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, has good organization and holds an unbelievable amount of toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: kls96

customer_reviews.title: big!
customer_reviews.text: worked well for my trip. a little larger than I anticipated but I guess I didn't pay attention to the dimensions?
customer_reviews.author: Fany Luck

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this to put my embroidery in. Great bag. Made well.
customer_reviews.author: I LOVE AUDIOBOOKS

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this item for over a year and it has been used extensively..held up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Best toiletries bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a convenient bag. It is perfect for large bottles and fit everything I needed for my trip
customer_reviews.author: Eessa08

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it, I'm using it before I head out ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, I'm using it before I head out on a seven month deployment and it holds all my tolietry needs. its sturdy enough to hold my large bottles of shampoo and conditioner from Paul Mitchell.
customer_reviews.author: Sierrah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This holds alot of products and keeps them safe. I've used it a few times and its very sturdy and easy to clean. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Broke before using it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this but the fabric loop holding the hook came undone and the top zipper came apart before I had a chance to take it on my first trip.
customer_reviews.author: Vetta

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Dries and is exactly what out says in description plus very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. It holds several full size items. So convenient. You just open it up and hang in hotel bathroom and everything within easy reach all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: kelly warnock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, great quality, perfect for all your travel needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost too big
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and well received but if I were to receive it I would think it's almost too big. When packing away in a suit case (due to FAA liquids limits etc) it would take up alot of precious room, However, that said, it's made very well. Strong seams, carry handle and roomy are all perks!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: The bag is a nice size, but I've only had it a week ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a nice size, but I've only had it a week or so and the hook is coming apart from the bag. It states can hold full size containers and that is true but the weight of that size is too much for the hook to support it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This will hold a lot of stuff, but the quality is pretty terrible. The interior mesh ripped in less than 24 hrs, and under LIGHT use. No good spot for cosmetics, and stuff falls out. The back itself is pretty heavy, so I wouldn't want to carry it on a plane. I use it for local trips, as I'm a house sitter. Would not recommend, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toiletry bag....well made, hold a lot, and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Runner

customer_reviews.title: Always on the go
customer_reviews.text: Like: Mess pockets Wish: one wasn’t mesh Have not had it long enough to comment on durability but I’m keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Devon D. McGettigan

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BAG!
customer_reviews.text: A great bag! Holds a lot of stuff, with lots of compartments to keep things organized. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: I never had to unpack my toiletries once during a ...
customer_reviews.text: I never had to unpack my toiletries once during a 7 day trip. Hung on back of bathroom door on a hook and it was my own personal cabinet/shelf. Held everything I needed, Plus some!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MelodySusie Premium Hanging toiletry bag, Large Travel Cosmetic, Toiletries, Makeup, Brushes Bag, Waterproof Portable Bathroom and Shower Organizer Kit for Women and Men
feature_bullets: Durable Materials: This Toiletry Bag is made of 300D polyester materials (Durable & Lightweight, Waterproof). The stitching is well sewn and reinforced at all stress points. Dual zipper elegant design make all operate more smoothly

Large Capacity – Size: 10.6x6.3x11 inches (LxWxH). 3 gallon capacity of this travel toiletry bag can meet all your different needs. You can put your make-up, shampoo, soap, toothbrush, toothpaste, shaving kit and so on, all in one place. Fits Full-Size bottle. Make your travel comfortably and easily to have all your necessities in one bag

Multifunction: This handing toiletry bag Built-in heavy duty hanging hook allows easier hanging and access on the bathroom door, shower rod or towel rack. Durable carrying handle and removable shoulder straps are convenient to carry or hung up. And the large toiletry bag can be folded very easily and thinly when not in use. Ideal for business trip, vacation, gym, makeup, outdoors activities, picnic, bathroom organization and more

Multiple Compartments Organizer: Compartments in various sizes make the bag functional and highly organized. Extra cushion, protect yours belongs from shocking. Elegant design, foldable and lightweight, organizing maximum toiletries. Perfect for one or two people to traveling
Quality Guarantee: The longest warranty can achieve 12 months friendly customer service at any times. NO Questions/NO Hassles
